title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any LangChain abstraction (LLM, embeddings, tool calling) with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. No API keys, 100% local. Features folders, prompts, sharing, multimodal, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Fluent builder API, async support, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Simple idiomatic Ruby wrapper around the HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama written in Go. Fuzzy search models, chat history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses Ollama models locally. No telemetry, fully offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama. Use local LLMs and embeddings in production-grade Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes: function calling, vision, voice, RAG, agents, fine-tuning, benchmarking.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples for persistent storage, AMD/NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds on macOS and Linux. Pin exact commits and CUDA versions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama. Strong typing, serde, tokio, and examples for chat, generate, embeddings.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama. Null-safe, streams, and example Flutter chat app.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming, dependency injection, and minimal API sample.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models to any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to chat with local models right inside Slack.

title: ollama-mistral
summary: Lightweight PyPI wrapper exposing Mistral 7B via Ollama with extra utilities for token counting and JSON mode.
